title: Denmark Open: Kidambi Srikanth suffers loss in men’s singles
text: SAINA SURVIVES SCARE, GUTTA-PONNAPPA OUT IN DENMARK OPEN 00:57 "It was a mixed day for Indian shuttlers at the $650,000 Denmark Open Super Series Premier. While Saina Nehwal and Kidambi Srikanth entered the second round of the event, doubles pair of Jwala Gutta and Ashwini Ponnappa crashed out in the very first round. " Recent related news India's leading shuttlers Saina Nehwal, PV Sindhu and Kidambi Srikanth made a positive start to their campaign, reaching the second round of the USD 650,000...
